TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CivicAddressResolver extends System.Object implements class System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver
Public NotInheritable Class CivicAddressResolver Implements ICivicAddressResolver

summary.span: Fornece funcionalidade para resolver um local baseado em coordenadas para um endereço civil.

span.span: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe fornece uma implementação de um local baseados em coordenadas que resolve para um endereço civil se o provedor local fornece as coordenadas e dados de endereço civil.The class provides an implementation of that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data. ## Examples O programa a seguir mostra como chamar para resolver um endereço civil de forma síncrona.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] O programa a seguir mostra como chamar para resolver um endereço civil de forma assíncrona.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como inicializar uma nova instância do classe.The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class. ```csharp CivicAddressResolver resolver = new CivicAddressResolver(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
Public Function ResolveAddress (coordinate As GeoCoordinate) As CivicAddress

param.name: coordinate
param.span: O que contém o local a resolver para um endereço cívico.

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: Modo síncrono resolve um endereço civil de um local com base em latitude e longitude.

span.span: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: Essa chamada bloqueará a execução do thread de chamada enquanto o endereço estiver sendo resolvido.

span.span: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

returns.span: O endereço civil que é resolvido do parâmetro .

span.span: The civic address that is resolved from the parameter.

returns.span: é retornado se o endereço não pode ser resolvido.

span.span: is returned if the address cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O é gerado quando a operação de resolução de endereço é concluída.The event is raised when the address resolve operation completes. O endereço civil que é resolvido a partir de `coordinate` retornado pelo parâmetro o membro do objeto que é passado para o manipulador de eventos.The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the member of the object that is passed to the event handler. ## Examples O programa a seguir demonstra como chamar para resolver um endereço civil de forma síncrona.The following program demonstrates how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

exception.span: não contém uma latitude e uma longitude válidas.

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveAddressAsync(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed

param.name: coordinate
param.span: O que contém o local a resolver para um endereço cívico.

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: Resolve um endereço de forma assíncrona de um local que se baseia em latitude e longitude.

span.span: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: Essa chamada não bloqueia a execução do thread de chamada enquanto o endereço está sendo resolvido.

span.span: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples O programa a seguir mostra como chamar para resolver um endereço civil de forma assíncrona.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]

exception.span: não contém uma latitude e uma longitude válidas.

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.
